title: Download Geographic Data on Various Topics Provided and Managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru
text: package provides R users new way access Peru’s official cartographic data various topics managed Spatial Data Infrastructure Peru.

title: Download Geographic Data on Various Topics Provided and Managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru
code: library(ggplot2) library(geoidep) #>  #> ── Welcome to geoidep ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> ℹ geoidep is a wrapper that allows you to download cartographic data for Peru from R. #> Currently, `geoidep` supports the following providers: #> ✔ INEI #> ✔ SERNAMP #> ✔ MINSA #> ✔ MTC #> ℹ For more information, please use the `get_providers()` function.

title: Download Geographic Data on Various Topics Provided and Managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru
code: departaments <- get_departaments(show_progress = FALSE) names(departaments) #> [1] "id"           "OBJECTID"     "CCDD"         "NOMBDEP"      "SHAPE_Length" #> [6] "SHAPE_Area"   "geom" # Display the first 10 rows of the data frame `departaments` head(departaments) #> Simple feature collection with 6 features and 6 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -79.45857 ymin: -17.28501 xmax: -70.80408 ymax: -2.986125 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #>   id OBJECTID CCDD   NOMBDEP SHAPE_Length SHAPE_Area #> 1  1        1   01  AMAZONAS    13.059047   3.199147 #> 2  2        2   02    ANCASH    11.788249   2.954697 #> 3  3        3   03  APURIMAC     7.730154   1.765933 #> 4  4        4   04  AREQUIPA    17.459435   5.330125 #> 5  5        5   05  AYACUCHO    17.127166   3.643705 #> 6  6        6   06 CAJAMARCA    12.540288   2.688386 #>                             geom #> 1 MULTIPOLYGON (((-77.81399 -... #> 2 MULTIPOLYGON (((-77.64697 -... #> 3 MULTIPOLYGON (((-73.74655 -... #> 4 MULTIPOLYGON (((-71.98109 -... #> 5 MULTIPOLYGON (((-74.34843 -... #> 6 MULTIPOLYGON (((-78.70034 -...

title: Download Geographic Data on Various Topics Provided and Managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru
Authors and Citation
text: antony barja. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: barja (2024). geoidep: Download Geographic Data Various Topics Provided Managed Spatial Data Infrastructure Peru. R package version 0.1.0, https://geografo.pe/geoidep/.

what: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
title: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
text: goal geoidep offers R users easy accessible way obtain official cartographic data various topics, society, transport, environment, agriculture, climate, among others. also includes information provided regional government entities technical-scientific institutions,managed Spatial Data Infrastructure Peru.

title: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
text: can install development version geoidep like :

title: Download Peruvian data managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of the National Institute of Statistics and Informatics (INEI) of Peru
text: simple example download Peru’s official administrative boundaries: first 10 rows original data displayed :
code: library(geoidep) #>  #> ── Welcome to geoidep ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> ℹ geoidep is a wrapper that allows you to download cartographic data for Peru from R. #> Currently, `geoidep` supports the following providers: #> ✔ INEI #> ✔ SERNAMP #> ✔ MINSA #> ✔ MTC #> ℹ For more information, please use the `get_providers()` function. dep <- get_departaments(show_progress = FALSE) head(dep) #> Simple feature collection with 6 features and 6 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: -79.45857 ymin: -17.28501 xmax: -70.80408 ymax: -2.986125 #> Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84 #>   id OBJECTID CCDD   NOMBDEP SHAPE_Length SHAPE_Area #> 1  1        1   01  AMAZONAS    13.059047   3.199147 #> 2  2        2   02    ANCASH    11.788249   2.954697 #> 3  3        3   03  APURIMAC     7.730154   1.765933 #> 4  4        4   04  AREQUIPA    17.459435   5.330125 #> 5  5        5   05  AYACUCHO    17.127166   3.643705 #> 6  6        6   06 CAJAMARCA    12.540288   2.688386 #>                             geom #> 1 MULTIPOLYGON (((-77.81399 -... #> 2 MULTIPOLYGON (((-77.64697 -... #> 3 MULTIPOLYGON (((-73.74655 -... #> 4 MULTIPOLYGON (((-71.98109 -... #> 5 MULTIPOLYGON (((-74.34843 -... #> 6 MULTIPOLYGON (((-78.70034 -...

what: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
text: function allows download latest version geometry ubigeos corresponding official political division departament boundaries Peru. information, can visit following page https://ide.inei.gob.pe/

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
code: get_departaments(dsn = NULL, show_progress = TRUE, quiet = TRUE)

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
text: dsn Character. Output filename. missing, temporary file created. show_progress Logical. Suppress bar progress. quiet Logical. Suppress info message.

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments
text: sf tibble object.

title: Download the Departament limits of INEI — get_departaments

code: get_districts(dsn = NULL, show_progress = TRUE, quiet = TRUE)

text: dsn Character. Output filename *.gpkg format. missing, temporary file created. show_progress Logical. Suppress bar progress. quiet Logical. Suppress info message.
